Janna.name: JannaБ
Janna.title: Ббthe Storm's FuryБ
Janna.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъThere are those sorcerers who give themselves over to the primal powers of nature, forgoing the learned practice of magic. Such a sorceress is Janna, who first learned magic as an orphan growing up admist the chaos that is the city-state of Zaun. Janna eked out what living she could on the streets. Life was tough and dangerous for the beautiful young girl, and she survived by her wits, and by stealing when wits weren't enough. The rampant magic that characterizes Zaun was the first and most alluring tool which Janna realized could both protect and elevate her. Janna discovered that she had an affinity for a particular type of magic - the elemental magic of air. She mastered her studies of air magic in a matter of months, almost as if she was born of it. Janna went from a street vagrant to an avatar of the air virtually overnight, stunning and surpassing those who taught her. Such a rapid ascension also changed her physical appearance, giving her an otherworldly look.ъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъSeeking to right the injustice in the world (particularly the insanity that has become the city of Zaun), Janna has brought her talents to the League. She is a voice for the regulation of magical experimentation and a supporter of the development of techmaturgy, making her an indirect ally of the city-state of Piltover and the amazing techmaturgical minds that live there. Janna is also a new favorite of the League's many fans. She is often the center of attention at functions, fan appreciation days, and other celebratory events. There is something untouchable about Janna, however, and her affections can change as quickly as the wind.ъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзDo not be captivated by Janna's beauty. Like the wind, she is one gust away from terrible destruction.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
Janna.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъThere are those sorcerers who give themselves over to the primal powers of nature, forgoing the learned practice of magic. Such a sorceress is Janna, who ...
allytips: БбГгEye of the Storm can be used on allied turrets.ДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзQuickly firing a Howling Gale without the charge up can be used to heavily disable the other team.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗTiming Janna's ultimate can push enemies away from a wounded ally or even separate enemies.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдSave an interrupt ability for when Janna uses her ultimate.дДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиListen for the charge up sound on Howling Gale in case Janna is trying to hit you with it from off screen or from brush.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиJanna's at her strongest when buffing another ally. If you can harass her ally, it will weaken her ability to fight you.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БHowling GaleБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъBy creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can active the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.ЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгSummons a whirlwind, which deals ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗзИ magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air. The whirlwind travels further, deals ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}БбГгДдЖ bonus damage, and knocks enemies higher, for each second it charges.ЖдДгГбБ

БбГгActivate again to release the whirlwind early.ДгГбБ

spells.name: ZephyrБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшJanna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.ШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БPassive: ББбГIncreases Movement Speed by ГбБ{{ e1 }}БбГг% and allows movement through units.ГбБ

БActive: БDeals Б{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДд magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by дДгГбБ{{ e3 }}% for Б{{ e4 }}БбГгДд seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.дДгГбБ

spells.name: БбEye Of The StormБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиJanna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгShields an allied Champion or turret for гГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГг seconds. The shield absorbs up to ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})Бб damage and grants бБ{{ e2 }}БбГ Attack Damage until it breaks.ГбБ

spells.name: MonsoonБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлJanna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.лЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжSummons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгД Health to nearby allies each second for 4 seconds.ДгГбБ

passive.name: БTailwindБ
passive.description: БбГгДдIncreases the Movement Speed of all allied champions by 3%.дДгГбБ
